thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 29 of 99
thread.title: S.

author: S.
title: S.
text: Several purchases went perfectly without complaint or concerns. Have only had to reach out to customer service once, and it was a good experience. It was during the holiday season, and I received confirmation that my question had been received and a message letting me know that there would be delayed responses due to the holiday but I had not been forgotten. It was very reassuring and to my satisfaction to be notified about this. In a reasonable amount of time I received a clarifying answer.
